```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(xml2)
response <- read_xml("https://lookup-service-prod.mlb.com/named.historical_draft.bam?season=1965")
response %>% xml_find_all("queryResults/row") %>% 
  map_dfr(function(row) row %>% xml_attrs() %>% as_tibble_row())
```
